'''''The Tolkien Quiz Book''''' is a [[1979]] book by Bart Andrews (with [[Bernie Zuber]]). It was also released in a British edition (London: Sphere, 1979. 160 pp. 18 cm. ISBN 0-7221-1136-3, paperback).<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam]],  "[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]" at [[Forodrim]].</ref>
